Reviews.Title: Awesome camera deal!
Reviews.Author: Jack M.
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Canon EOS 60D package from Sunset Electronics and I'm completely satisfied. Tons of goodies and accessories for a very reasonable price.Everything was packed with care, nothing was damaged. Everything new.I'm still overwhelmed with all the neat stuff that came with it. The camera is amazing. I'm having a blast trying out different functions.You cannot go wrong with this deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D
Reviews.Author: steven r ritenour
Reviews.Content: I am new to the world of digital and I thought the Canon 60D might be above my pay grade. However i have found that it is similar in many ways to the Canon AE-1 that I have used for 30+ years. The exception is the the camera does all the focusing, all you need to do is point. Of course it has many more capabilities that are too numerous to mention here but I highly recommend the Canon 60D.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Great Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Gordon M. Glasgow "Amazon user"
Reviews.Content: This camera is one I have been wanting for a long time. I was thrilled to see such a set up for a great price!The retailer was quick to respond to my questions and handled the purchase wonderfully!

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: James M. Fenton
Reviews.Content: Camera was great, but the lenses are the cheapest or next to cheapest sold by Canon. For a beginner like me they worked fine but I'm thinking I could have just bought the camera and purchased more quality lenses.

Reviews.Title: Everything You Want, and More.
Reviews.Author: Gadfly57
Reviews.Content: This camera has some obvious shortcomings, i.e. - sensor size, that could effect some photographers.  Having said that, this kit is awesome.  I am a photojournalist.  With 1080 dpi movie capability at 60 fps there is little I cannot capture.  The multiple lens package covers most needs very effectively.  The camera's firmware capability is out of this world.  It can even produce, automatically, a step-up and step-down trio of shots with one pull of the trigger.  On the fly cababilities are incredible, including an Automatic Focus Servo that can track a moving subject for multiple shots in different focal planes.I could go on for quite some time.  Suffices to say that I am VERY picky about my photography and this camera has been everything I wanted, and more.C. Michael Tucker

Reviews.Title: Best value for the best kit ever!
Reviews.Author: Tengo
Reviews.Content: This kit arrived in a big box with so many things inside. Even today, after months, I still did not have a chance to go through everything. The camera is amazing. Three lens are great and accessories? There is an ocean of them starting from filters and finishing with fish eye sets, extra battery, car charger, great backpack. Would strongly recommend this set!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Seller
Reviews.Author: J. Samkyla
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera kit and found there are so many pieces I have yet to try them all yet.  I had one issue with an item but it was handled immediately and better than I expected!  The package came with a note than I should contact them if there were any issues.  They meant it and I am extremely happy with their customer service!!!!!  Thank You.  I will be back.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy bundle
Reviews.Author: Vivek K Katakwar
Reviews.Content: I will not recommend this bundle because the items you will get with this kit other then Canon Body and Lens are not worth more then $15-20 individually. So better buy Canon body + Lens alone somewhere else by doing some research upfront and get other filters and items listed in this bundle if you need it. For example you will get a dedicated flash worth $19.99 (looks like kids toy) with this bundle and you won't feel like using it.Not worth for your money as a bundle.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift Ever!
Reviews.Author: product reviewer
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift for Christmas. I've been playing with it all day today, and without ever using a camera with add-on lenses, I've been able to take beautiful pictures already. I'm looking forward to years of awesome pictures with this camera. Thank you! Sheila

Reviews.Title: soooo love with this kit.
Reviews.Author: trikobear
Reviews.Content: i was so suprise when a recived the box.... everything was brand new, and packed with care...  such a good deal..!!!!

Reviews.Title: super pro !
Reviews.Author: Gbutterfly
Reviews.Content: I ordered a camera kit 60D Canon,  and not only came with all the products  shown on the list  it was a great deal, a good packaging, and very fast, I loved it and I am enjoying my camera now ! thanks great seller!

Reviews.Title: Camera great extras not so good
Reviews.Author: Bradley Archer
Reviews.Content: The Camera and lenses were great and work amazingly. Everything else was crap and not even worth the money.Overall the deal is good because of the three lenses but don't think the tripod and other extras will last.

Reviews.Title: 60D +3 lens kit review
Reviews.Author: wuSchu
Reviews.Content: Pros: Shipping was quick and everything came undamaged and in working order. This kit is the kit to get if you're wanting to start a photography hobby. There are more options on the 60D than there are the Txi models regardless of having the same sensor so, in all reality, you're not going to need to upgrade this camera unless you're doing exposures that require a MkII or better. Lenses aren't top of the line but if you do not have the 50mm lens that comes in this kit then it's worth getting. The lens is cheap but a very good lens and should be in everyone's camera case that owns a Canon. The telephoto lens performs sub par in my opinion and the 18-55 zoom is a good standard lens for really any situation. The carrying backpack holds everything that comes with the kit. It's not the best carrier and I do wish it had an extra zipper pocket on the front, but it serves it's purpose.Cons: The tripod that comes with this kit is trash. It's small and portable and fits on the side of the carrier nicely but I cannot think of any reason why I would break it out and set it up. It would be much more to your advantage to carry a chain around with a bolt on the end so you have a portable monopod that works off tension by holding it to the ground with your foot while pulling the camera up to your eye for quick situations that something like this would be needed for. The tripod is pretty useless unless you don't have one, in which case get one because you'll hate the one in the kit.Other than that, no complaints. You get what you pay for and the price is respectable for everything that comes in this kit. You probably won't find a 2 lens kit for any cheaper. Great value.

Reviews.Title: So much worth it!
Reviews.Author: Mia Deng
Reviews.Content: You can get this kit as a photography novice or someone more advanced. But this package contains almost EVERYTHING you can think of to begin with, and then gradually grow up on them. The package allows you to shoot most styles of photos, wide angle, HD, portrait shooting, macro lenses, etc. Packing was impeccable.Financially speaking, this is the greatest deal I have seen. I have been researching for deals of 60D. Mostly are 999 $ for body with one lens. I am so glad that I got this deal!If you are someone who wants to go into details of DSLR photography, then this kit is the best you can get :)

Reviews.Title: Did not get everything noted in the deal
Reviews.Author: Romeo
Reviews.Content: This was a lot of money for a good deal.  Great product.  Look forward to learning how to take full advantage of all of the features.  Did not get the small tripod,dedicated Shoe Mount Flash and the memory card reader does not work.  That is a bit disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great package for a great price
Reviews.Author: Nicolas Hosford
Reviews.Content: For a while i've been wanting a DSLR camera, but couldn't afford the accessories that i wanted with it. However I found this package deal on Amazon and it's amazing! There's so much stuff in it I got overwhelmed. Every item listed in the description is in the kit, new and in it's original packaging. Originally i was worried that things may be damaged in the shipping process, but everything was secure! The only complaint I have is that i wish they would list the dimensions for the backpack/case. It is a little small for my liking. Still, it is a good little pack for day trips. I would definitely recommend this kit and this seller to anybody who's looking!

Reviews.Title: Great deal, worth the price
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I was interested in getting the Cannon EOS 60D DSLR but I wanted to buy a kit that was worth it.  I've received everything that I was promised, all brand new.  The only complaint I have was the liquid that came with lens cleaning kit.  (This was mentioned in other reviews and it happened to me as well).  Wasn't that big of a deal because it was contained within its plastic wrap and didn't get on anything else.  I love the camera case/backpack.  It keeps the camera and additional lenses nice and snug and allows you to adjust it the way you need it.  Great deal, glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: A very good and easy camera to use.
Reviews.Author: Cliff
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the EOS camera kit and all the lenses and things that came in the package. I feel it was a pretty good deal.

Reviews.Title: Camera and Kit
Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: The camera is a dream, the kit was just a huge bonus. I mean where else could you get 4 different lenses and a camera of this quality for the same price you would normally pay for just the camera. there were also tons of great additional equipment that came along with the kit. I especially liked the fact that it came with 2 batteries

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DeAnne Warnekros
Reviews.Content: My son bought this camera and has been very pleased. He says this package had everything you need to get started on a photography hobby.

Reviews.Title: Very good!!!
Reviews.Author: Mati
Reviews.Content: I liked it very much. All items are really good. High quality. I highly recommend it. No problems wth it.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: staci pickens
Reviews.Content: great camera, pretty good package, would recommend trollling all the package deals to make sure this is the lens combo that you want.  research your lenses along with what you are wanting to do before you make your investment.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures!
Reviews.Author: shawn
Reviews.Content: We considered several other canon cameras but upon recommendation by some of our professional photographer friends we went with this one. we have not used all the lenses yet but with the 18-55 lens we have some really great pictures of our 6mo old. Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: ShahrukhT
Reviews.Content: The deal seemed to be too good, but i stuck to it and i ordered it and believe me everything was delivered on time and in perfect condition! Get this deal as long as it lasts! its absolutely crazy and good value for money!

Reviews.Title: Some great equipment bundled with junk
Reviews.Author: hafnon
Reviews.Content: I should first point out that I would highly recommend the Canon 60D camera. In fact, all of the Canon stuff in this package I would highly recommend. Almost everything else, No. The cheap memory included failed within the year, I have not heard back from the manufacturer after sending it back under warranty. The memory card reader also has difficulties staying mounted on my computer. The tripod is pretty cheap, if you are seriously considering buying a prosumer camera, you should definitely be buying a better tripod. The lens selection and lens adaptors was poorly though through, as the 50mm lens has a 52mm filter size not the 58mm filter size of the other lenses. You really have no need of a 2x adaptor if the kit comes with a 75-300mm lens. And you would be better off with one really nice polarizing filter instead of all the cheap ones included. I give it four stars just because the Canon stuff alone justifies the price and I am happy overall with the purchase. But, do not depend on the junk that comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Strong
Reviews.Content: I'm new to the eos world but this kit has everything.  I felt like a pro the first day.  Great value.

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D with goodies
Reviews.Author: Roxann Welker
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in the package that I bought, when I picked this package it showed me a picture of what I was getting, but when I got my stuff some things were not the same as the picture.  I picked this package for the ones that I did not get, and was told to send back everything and they will see what they can do, which would cost me more.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Nader Jibai
Reviews.Content: The replacement battery did not charge completely and seems corrupted but all the canon products from the camera to the lenses are excellent.

Reviews.Title: The Best First Time DSLR
Reviews.Author: Ferzio Cosby Mampwe
Reviews.Content: Thanks to Sunset Electronics I have a DSLR. The shipping process was excellent and I managed to get the camera delivered in less than the projected time. It is a great camera and I am taking my hobbyist photgraphy to a higher level. It also had a good amount of extras for the price I paid.The supplier was prompt to replace the cleaning fluid that had spilled in under one week and  I must say, the have nailed customer service down to a science.I was disappointed with the flash seeing as it does not really match what was advertised. I may have to spend a couple hundred dollars to get a good flash.

Reviews.Title: problem
Reviews.Author: Moises Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is defective use it 2 days and on day 3 the 50mm lens and 18-55mm were with mohoo with rust particles inside

Reviews.Title: A great kit to begginers
Reviews.Author: Mariana
Reviews.Content: The cámera and the lenses are canon.The pack arrive on time, in perfect conditions.The pro: It has to many usefull tools, like tripod, filters, lenses, card holder, card, etc.The negative: the bag is horrible. It get all messed up weeks later. The flash is usefull, but is not a quality one.But it is a great pack for the price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: iophalanx
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to add to my arsenal of video equipment. The footage I get from this camera is very good compared to video cameras. But the 12-minute limit is obnoxious, and I already have "dead pixels." Fortunately, there is a way to negate the dead pixels in this camera. My Canon video cameras have dead pixels also, but there's no way fix that in those cams. So, that's a plus.The kit lenses that came in this kit were surprisingly adequate, as far as picture-quality, but, especially on the 75 - 300 lens, the build quality is sorely lacking. It broke after about 6 months with no known cause.Overall, I give the 60D a thumbs-up, but with better cameras out there now for very little more money, I would seriously consider one of them over this camera at this point in time.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: shelvateen Baskerville
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what I was looking for and for the price received all the products needed. My son was very happy

Reviews.Title: Great investment for serious beginners to intermediate photographers
Reviews.Author: A. Shrewsbury
Reviews.Content: Not only am I VERY pleased with the money I spent on this kit, I'm more impressed with Big Mike's service.They left out a few items when they initially shipped it to me. I wrote them and informed them and had the items to me within 3 days.No, the longer focal point lenses are not "top of the line", BUT the reality is you have to be quite advanced to truly justify the price jump for EF-S lenses or larger diameter lenses.I use this set up personally and professionally and I am VERY happy with it and have been published with the imagery this set up has produced based on my knowledge of it and comfort in using it.I highly recommend this for someone is serious about learning, but cannot afford or yet justify the price increase for "nicer" gear.The included bag is a bit cheap as far as quality. It didn't hold up for more than about 45 days of regular but light use. However, I knew that going into this and was already planning on getting another bag. The placement of the singular zipper makes the bag a little awkward for switching lenses. It also allows for your camera or gear to potentially fall out... BUT you get so much with this set up that I do not find this to be worth taking away from the camera gear re:the number of stars it rates.

Reviews.Title: Best buy on an Canon 60D
Reviews.Author: R. J. Medrala
Reviews.Content: I liked the features of the camera and all of the extras that came with it.  It is the best buy out there for the Canon EOS 60 DSLR.  It is a great kit for someone new to DSLRs.

Reviews.Title: great!!!
Reviews.Author: Sheng Liu
Reviews.Content: I dream a Canon 60D for a long time.And now I got it with a much cheaper price! I like it~

Reviews.Title: Great for video!
Reviews.Author: R. Falquez
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically for video recording, and im not afraid to said that for this price range, this is the best as you can get... i also recommend installing magic lantern to get to the highest possive level (raw video)

Reviews.Title: repeated parts and exhausted battery
Reviews.Author: giovanni
Reviews.Content: the flash is so cheap that u cant show it around one of the batteries was totally gone and they put a repeated macro lensthe rest is fine good camera and lenses i had to buy a flash tho  and a bg e9 battery gripthat's an inconvenient

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I love my camera kit. It is by far the best deal of any kit that I found. I know that it does so much more than I've used it for.......I just haven't made the time to really learn how to use it yet.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable price..
Reviews.Author: KAAN PALA
Reviews.Content: Side products are not really good quality and fit with Canon products; however, the camera body and the lenses are already worth the price! Very good bundle to start...

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sanjeev S.
Reviews.Content: This one I gave as a gift. Good starter camera, excellent features and the package deal is what I love most. Excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Lillyssj
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera and deal!The tripod was kind of a joke as it was very light and looked cheap but the rest of the products are good

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: Excellent speed of delivery.  Everything was as promised.  The packaging of the order was great with ample protectionf for the camera and its accessories.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D Camera
Reviews.Author: SStarr
Reviews.Content: This is the best Digital Camera and even professionals use it.  The pictures are so clear and sharp.  Consumer Reports listed 4 top cameras and they had the same high rating.  This one was the lowest priced and was rated to do the same as the ones that cost twice as much.  This kit comes with everything you would want and the camera case is well made.  It would cost a lot more if you were to purchase everything separately.

Reviews.Title: this is a great bundle
Reviews.Author: fiberartist "fiber artist"
Reviews.Content: Order came quickly.  Instead of backpack, I was sent a shoulder pack -- and it was coming apart in one seam.  Called the company and they told me they would send me a new backpack without having to return the defective shoulder pack.  The new one arrived quickly as is perfect.  This company is fabulous and is one of those rare companies  that believes in good customer service.  I highly recomment.  There was SO MUCH in this bundle, that I was surprised.  I've seen other sites that charge as much just for the camera body.

Reviews.Title: Excellent package!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas F.
Reviews.Content: This package has it all, literally. A great starter kit with about everything you need. Everything fits in the bag which is a bonus. Only problem was the tripod broke on set up and the flash is of low quality. The rest is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: What a steal!!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Das "3 Wolf shirt owner/lover/seducer"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this after months of extensive research and dubbed it to be a great deal. I individually priced out the lens that came in the package to see how much the total cost would be.I put the order in and within a few days a 14 pound box arrived.All the items were new and factory sealed.Everything listed in the description was in the box.I was shocked that they provide a 32gig SDHC card.Great deal, would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: lot stuff a good price
Reviews.Author: irene martos
Reviews.Content: everything was ok no problems with anything i dont find any other place where i can find all this products for this price i recomended

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: We use the camera all the time. Works great. On the boat the telephoto lens is used. At events we use the standard lens. Flash is a little cheap but works.

Reviews.Title: Perfect graduation gift
Reviews.Author: mhill
Reviews.Content: This camera kit was a gift for my son, who is graduating with a degree in Film.  He needed a good camera to finish out his last few projects and he said this camera will help him get started in his own business as well.  He's very happy with the camera!

Reviews.Title: Great and worth Money!!!!
Reviews.Author: ~Heather~
Reviews.Content: This product is well worth the purchase. I rate this with a 100%, Love my new camera and would recommend this to anyone!!!! the best thing that I have ever bought!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome value
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Was excellent camera kit and value. Was surprised unpacking that it contained so much. Am very happy with all that was included.

Reviews.Title: Pretty dang cool
Reviews.Author: Robyn Tingey
Reviews.Content: I was surprised with everything that came with it.  If you are looking to start as new photographer I recommend this package deal.  By the time you buy half the stuff in you would exceed the amount asked for.  However know that the tripod is pretty low quality but super light. I don't see myself not breaking it in the near future.  The 50mm lens is cool but it's only 52 diameter and all attachments are for a 58 diameter lens.  So look into getting an enlarger ring if you want to use attachments for that.  I didn't get the filters but I did get two sets of micro lens attachments so I guess they were out.  Over all this was good and it was fun to open everything and see what all you got!  Happy hunting.

Reviews.Title: Great  camera with superb bundle
Reviews.Author: Jag
Reviews.Content: Its a absolutely great great bundle from Amazon.realy worth. If I bought these items individually it will cost me lot of money and also all included items are realy important and usefull. I will recommend this bundle package from AMAZON for to any body who is looking for a good camera with other acce:Also customer service of shipper and Amazon was realy superp.

Reviews.Title: Good price! Good camera!
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: Is a great price for the whole package, the bag is too small I had to buy another bag but for this price it's worth it. I love all the gadgets! the 32Gb memory, the card reader all the filters, definitely worth it! I bought it from Big Mike's for $1,229.99 around christmas I just realized the raised the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Richard Grainger
Reviews.Content: A whole lot of camera equipment bundled with an wonderful camera. Everything you need to start taking pictures plus some. I did a lot of price checking and couldn't touch the price for all the items I received with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: What a package!
Reviews.Author: elle
Reviews.Content: So many pieces with this kit.  Looking forward to using every one of them.  Several pieces are from Zeikos, and I am not sure of their quality, but the main lenses are Canon.  Great buy

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: M.H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a family member. She loves it. Had a problem with a lens and the company was quick to exchange it.

Reviews.Title: Best Investment Ever
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: I received everything just as it stated. It's beautiful! My zoom lens is acting up a little so I'm not too sure about that but everything else is great!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: J.P. Howard "ActiveMom"
Reviews.Content: What a great deal this package was!!!!  One thing I love about Canon is that the lenses are interchangeable.  We had a 35mm Canon Rebel and the lenses from that camera fit perfectly on this new 60D!  I am very pleased with this package, and the camera is unbelievable!

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: happy customer
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with the camera and it is a great value.  I Highly recommend!  The Canon 60D is an excellent camera and I ws able to take great shots right out of the box.  I also purchased the Canon 60D digital field guide which is a great help in learning the different aspects of the creative portion.

Reviews.Title: WHAT A DEAL!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: iRasta
Reviews.Content: Talk about stuff!!!!! i am extremely pleased with my purchase, excellent kit for any person who wants to start in the photography field, i am grateful mainly for the 32GB SDHC card since i mainly bought it to film documentaries and music videos, will be getting the dslr rig and steady cam to complete it, any suggestions as to the aforementioned equipment is most welcome......also packaging was nice, its weight came up to around 13lbs, which was not bad at all......a definite best buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Isaiah Ratey
Reviews.Content: If you are into photography and do more than just take pictures of your kids birthday parties, holidays, or tourist traps then this camera is well worth the money. The features on this camera are phenominal. Extremely user friendly no matter what settings you use, even the manual settings are all easy to manipulate. Highly recommend this camera for anybody who loves photography. If I ever have to replace my camera I will buy another EOS 60D without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Donna R. Hall
Reviews.Content: I have never used a camera like this before and I was impressed with how easy it is use.  I do wish it had come with a better in between lens, but I am more than happy with everything that came with the package.  An unbeatable price for sure.  I am still in the process of trying everything out!  A great camera over all.I love that it came with an extra battery which I have not even needed yet.  The camera is not too heavy but feels solid in my hands.  Still learning all the bells and whistles but from what I have used so far I would highly recommend this camera to anyone who is taking a jump to an EOS camera.  The colors are vibrant and crisp.  I love to photograph flowers and birds and this camera does produce a beautiful finished product.  Am having lots of fun trying everything out.  Still have not used the extended flash and tripod, but will use them when I go camping next week.  I would recommend this product to anyone!The battery life has been impressive with the number of shots I have taken and it still has half the battery life left.  The speed in which the battery charges is also great.Filming movies was such a snap the first time that I did not realize I was recording and recorded more than I thought!.  Beautiful videos.I have only had the camera two weeks so far, but compared to my old camera, which is a Kodax Max, which has also been a great camera for the money, I have lots to learn yet.  I still need to try out the filters and special lens.  I also have only used all automatic settings so far.  I am sure I will do lots of experimenting next week with all the lenses and filters.  Maybe a better review will follow after more experience.The download of the software and usage is very easy also.  I can't believe how fast the camera downloads all the photos and the options you have.  Another great thing with this camera.  Enjoy

Reviews.Title: Pretty good, with some issues.
Reviews.Author: Robert Joseph
Reviews.Content: The camera is a great deal! It was packed with care and all was good; however, the tripod is not as strong as I thought it would be, the memory card was supposed to be a 32GB, I received a 16GB - I would've returned it but I'm out of the country now- the memo card is acting up a little. Everything seems really delicate and too fragile for me to handle, I feel like I'm going to break something. And the backpack is great,but it's not as big as I imagined it: it fits all the camera's lenses and accessories, keeping it full, no pocket for the tripod or space for the flash. Other than that, it's a great deal! Everything was new. BUY IT WHILE IT'S STILL THERE!I also want to thank my father's friend for carrying the camera all the way to my country. I know it was difficult! Shokran! :D

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: when i was looking for this camera in the stores it would be over  $1000 alone but with the deal i got purchasing it here was way better then i expected. it took me 3 hours to sort through the box. it came with so many things i feel overwhelmed. as an art school student this was an absolute great price for me and even for anyone. =)

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Maker
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my camera as I am taking a photography course with it. The product was good but the handling by Amazon was horrible. Thanks to the shipper.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Buntjer "caflyfisher"
Reviews.Content: the only thing i didn't care was for the package deal had a bunch of useless still, the camera case was to small, and a few other things. but the camera is really nice after i bought a 17-270 lens for it

Reviews.Title: Canon 60d Kit
Reviews.Author: Nicolas Guzman
Reviews.Content: I gave this 4 stars. I understand that is a kit and and it can be expensive, when you purchase a Kit you expect it to be what you saw on the website. the bag and card reader that I received were not good they fell apart as soon as I used them. the good thing, I called the company and they shipped me the new pieces. I have shot two projects with the 60D and would say that so far i'm satisfied. Im shooting my second short film in July. I will have more info by then. overall, for the price good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great kit for a great pice
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as advertised.  This kit is much cheaper than anywhere else and I'm really enjoying the 60D - it takes beautiful pictures on even the generic setting.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Erin King
Reviews.Content: I am ecstatic with this camera and all the things that came with it.  The camera makes excellent pictures, easy to use, easy to change lenses.  I love the backpack that came with it and am able to pack the lenses and camera in it without worrying about them rolling around inside.  I could not be happier with this package.

Reviews.Title: Great product(s) at an affordable price.
Reviews.Author: Nina Simon
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for variety in a starter kit, this is where to look. I love using a 50 mm, so this package won me over right there. The lens attachments take awhile to get used to, but once you find the "sweet spot" they are fun to shoot with. Wish the 18-55 kit lens was traded for something else, but other than that, no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Buena maquina
Reviews.Author: Moises Benites Barron
Reviews.Content: Muy buen kit. Lo estoy usando par fotografía y vídeo. Lo único, sería bueno un lente más versátil que el 18-55.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Bundled With Lots of Accessories!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received the camera bundled with the accessories, tripod and camera bag and was very impressed! Very useful items - extra battery, charger, cleaning cloth, etc. in addition to the lenses and filters. Everything (except the tripod) fit neatly in the camera bag, with room to spare. I have shown the camera and all of the accessories to a few people and they were very impressed with the amount of stuff included for one price. Seller packed the items well and shipped it out promptly. Great deal!

Reviews.Title: OH YEAH...:)
Reviews.Author: MAHDI HABIB HASAN
Reviews.Content: THANXXXXXXXX MAN MILLION TIME...:)GOOD SERVICES...:)THE PRICE IS GOOD..:)I HOPE TO PAY FROM YOU NEXT TIME...:)GOOD BUY...:)

Reviews.Title: Great bundle for the price!
Reviews.Author: starvoyager
Reviews.Content: I love this bundle, and everything was great except for one issue I found out about the Canon D60 camera body itself--for whatever reason, the grip pad on the back of the camera's hand grip started catching on my thumb and would start to peel up.  I have now learned that this is just the design of the camera, so you just have to get used to having your thumb over that part if holding it, or else, your thumb will have a tendency to catch the edge and cause it to peel.  If not for that point, I would give 5 stars, especially since Canon products have always been phenomenal for me.  Hopefully, Canon will take a look at this, but I wouldn't hold my breath (I did contact their support, but they just said send it back for repair--it is not broken, it is a minor design flaw).  In addition, when I received the original bundle, a video LED light was sent by mistake, but I contacted Big Mike's Electronics, and they sent the correct shoe mount flash (and even let me keep the LED light at no charge)!  Definitely a customer focused reseller!  As for the camera itself, the functions are awesome, and the images are fantastic.  Hopefully, this will be a camera to last my family for many years.

Reviews.Title: Re
Reviews.Author: Cortney
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Canon Eos / SLR / Rebal. I started with a 35mm Rebal that i loved. Moved up to the XTi in 2006And still have and love and intent on keeping. And now after only 2 days i realize how much more this modelIs but im excited to learn the features and play with it.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Deal!
Reviews.Author: Steven E Hartman
Reviews.Content: Other places this price would only get you the camera. With all the accessories the deal becomes amazing! top notch gear at a rock bottom price. I'm going to look for a deal like this with a Canon video camera next!

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Allison Campbell
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be more thrilled with this package! My camera and accessories arrived quickly and all was accounted for. What a great find! Not to mention a great deal!

Reviews.Title: they sale returned items!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Wang
Reviews.Content: The kit I bought from Superfinds has many problems. First,  the photoes got with the 3 lenses are not real and not limpid  at AF model.Second, the 2 zoom telephoto lenses don't work with wide angle. Third, I found the spare battery was scratched, especially the contact, when I opened the plastic bag at the first time. It seems a used one, I'm not sure how about the origional battery. (I want to but don't know how to upload the photos) Fourth, they adjusted down low the price before I received my order. After contacting, Superfinds agreed to return. But they asked ME to post the items back and finally gave me partial refund. The excuse is I opened and used them, "the items that cannot be RESOLD are clearly a LOOS to our company". They responded with dirty words!
